translation.Message_0_Page_0: <color=epic>Samantha</color> handles our vehicles. She seems to have a knack for that kind of stuff. <color=epic>Dominic</color> handles the tech here, he seems to be quite good at that. He even got a communication system setup!
translation.Message_0_Page_1: You'll probably be helping out getting mechanical supplies for <color=epic>Samantha</color>, while <color=epic>Dominic</color> will need technology parts and the like.
